title: How to create a new project in Visual Studio Code?
entry: When I open Visual Studio Code, I don't see an option to create a new project. How do I create a new project?

title: Asp.Net Course
entry: Hii guys. I currently have the 'Complete Applied Web Development Training' course from the Sadık teacher on Udemy. I need to develop a project with ASP. Do I need to take this course 'Advanced Web Development from Scratch with Asp.Net Core 8.0' or will my current course be sufficient?

title: Json file content is deleted on every restart
entry: I am making a discord bot. I tried to save it in a json file instead of the database. I added a lot of things without paying attention, but every time I start the bot, the contents are reset. I tried to back it up to the database and transfer it to json files to prevent it from getting lost, but I couldn't do it. Where could I be making a mistake?

title: I Don't Know My Rockstar Games Account's Email Password xxxxxxxx
entry:
URGENT!!!!!
Guys, I bought RDR2 yesterday and connected a Rockstar account for GTA 3-4 years ago, but I cannot access that account now, it has disappeared, how can I solve this, please help urgently.

title: Web team
entry: Hello friends, I am Emir. I'm looking for people to design a website together. I'm taking a 'web design course' as an elective at school. I have knowledge of HTML but I have intermediate knowledge of CSS. (I'm trying to make a layout or responsive design.) I'm looking for a friend who will be interested regardless of their knowledge level.
